text: Bernard Maris (23 September 19467 January 2015) was a French economist, writer and journalist. He was also a shareholder in Charlie Hebdo magazine. He was born in Toulouse, France. Maris was murdered in January 2015, in the Charlie Hebdo shooting at the headquarters of the magazine in Paris. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French economists Category:French journalists Category:Victims of the Charlie Hebdo shooting Category:Writers from Toulouse
title: Bernard Maris
